nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20
nodes.name: IERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Unsigned math operations with safety checks that revert on error.
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two unsigned integers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two unsigned integers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides two unsigned integers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
nodes.name: mod

nodes.documentation:
@dev get address of smart contract owner
@return address of owner
nodes.name: getowner

arguments.value: You are not authenticate to make this transfer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not authenticate to make this transfer"

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to check if the message sender is owner
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal function for modifier
nodes.name: isOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfer ownership of the smart contract. For owner only
@return request status
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Lock all transfer functions of the contract
@return request status
nodes.name: setAllTransfersLockStatus

nodes.name: addLockingTime

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "All transactions are locked for this contract"

nodes.name: AllTransfersLockStatus
checkLocking

nodes.name: name

nodes.documentation: @return the symbol of the token.
